title: Stories from Gippsland : Digital Storytelling project
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory

abstract: Nine stories of family, inspiration and love.
description: Nine members of the Gippsland community tell of the things dearest to them : whether they be close friends, life changing experiences, treasured animals or inspirational family members. These things and people have all served the participants in providing them with a sense of home.
